translation.en: What's up, Grandpa? Where you going?
[gasps] Holy fuck! Who the fuck is that?
-Oh. -Hey, it's me! It's me, it's me.
-What the fuck are you doing here? -It's me.
-[laughs] What? -You scared the shit out of me.
translation.fr:
‎- Quoi ?
‎- Tu m'as foutu la trouille.

translation.en: Sorry, sorry, sorry, all right? Don't freak out.
I can't stand it when you do that!
Hey, so when is your dad's birthday again?
Uh, November 9th.
Cool, cool, okay. Yeah, I got a fun gift idea for him.
translation.fr:
‎Super.
‎J'ai une idée de cadeau marrante pour lui.

translation.en: What? Which one?
Yeah, I'm gonna get him these, like, Omaha Steaks.
translation.fr: ‎Je vais lui faire envoyer des steaks.

translation.en: -You know... you know about Omaha Steaks? -Oh.
Yeah. Like, they put 'em in a box... -Mmm-hmm. -...they send 'em off,
translation.fr: ‎Ils les emballent, ils te les envoient,

translation.en: and then you take 'em out of the box and throw 'em on a grill.
translation.fr:
‎tu les sors de la boîte
‎et tu les fais griller.

translation.en: I'm gonna send your dad, like, a couple dozen.
-I think he'll like it. -Cool.
-I'll just-- -Don't touch my feet.
What? Come on, you know you like that when I touch your feet.
translation.fr: ‎Mais tu aimes bien que je les touche.

translation.en: -Come on-- -Don't touch my feet. I just think, it'd be good. [stutters]
translation.fr:
‎- Les touche pas.
‎- Je pense que ça serait bien.

translation.en: I need you back. I need you to take care of me.
translation.fr: ‎J'ai besoin que tu prennes soin de moi.

translation.en: And... and I was thinking about us...
[stammers] and... about my heart and how I feel about you.
translation.fr:
‎et à ce que je ressens pour toi
‎dans mon cœur.

translation.en: Come on, I know you. And I love you and you're so hot.
translation.fr:
‎Je te connais bien.
‎Je t'aime et en plus, tu es canon.

translation.en: And I just... I need you, Mama.
Fine. Just shut the fuck up! I'll fuck you, but then you have to go.
translation.fr:
‎D'accord. Mais ferme-la !
‎Je vais te baiser, et tu te casses.

translation.en: -You're not sleeping here tonight. -Yeah, that's cool.
translation.fr:
‎- Tu dors pas ici.
‎- Pas de problème.

translation.en: I was looking at this website... -Mmm-hmm. -...and I found this rug.
translation.fr:
‎J'ai trouvé ce tapis
‎en surfant sur Internet.

translation.en: I thought it would look really good in your living room.
Yeah, I like that orange one. It's nice.
I was thinking the blue one.
Sure. Blue works, too.
Yeah, I mean, either/or...
Orange or blue, whatever one you're standing on,
translation.fr:
‎Orange ou bleu,
‎tant qu'il est sous tes pieds,

translation.en: it's gonna look good.
I was thinking about that, um... you know the blue rug.
translation.fr: ‎Je repensais au tapis bleu, tu sais.

translation.en: Maybe we don't get it, like, for my place, but...
translation.fr:
‎On pourrait l'acheter,
‎mais pas pour chez moi...

translation.en: Like, what if we got it for, like, our place?
You wanna move in together?
-I mean, do you? Do you-- -Yeah.
-You wanna move in? -Yeah.
-[moans] -Let's move in together.
-Yes! -I am God's warrior!
-Yes, you are! Yes, you are! -[yelling]
I'm gonna come. I'm gonna come.
I'm comin'. I'm comin'.
[Eric] Do you remember that little...
The travel-size Connect Four? Do you remember that game?
What? Why?
I just wanna... I wanna play a game from my youth, you know?
translation.fr:
‎Je veux jouer à un jeu
‎de quand j'étais petit.

translation.en: Nobody has the attention span anymore to just sit and play a game.
translation.fr:
‎On n'a plus la patience
‎de s'asseoir et de jouer à un jeu.

translation.en: What about Operation? Remember Operation?
[mimics electrocution] Ah, shit.
Why can't we just sit anymore?
Maybe that's 'cause you're coked up.
That's not it, all right? Okay, let's--
Nobody can just sit and read a book anymore.
translation.fr: ‎On s'assoit plus pour lire un bouquin.

translation.en: Nobody just sits and reads a book-- All right, you know what? We'll...
translation.fr:
‎On s'assoit plus pour lire...
‎Tu sais quoi ?

translation.en: Let's both read books, and we'll see who gets distracted first.
translation.fr:
‎On va lire,
‎et on verra qui est distrait le premier.

translation.en: We'll see... we'll see who's gonna do that.
I'm not gonna read with you, Eric.
translation.fr: ‎Je vais pas lire avec toi, Eric.

translation.en: All right, this is what we'll do.
I'm gonna read Crime and Punishment, all right?
And you'll read Cujo, all right? That's what we'll do.
translation.fr: ‎Toi, tu vas lire ‎Cujo.‎ On va faire ça.

translation.en: And we'll see who can read the most pages without getting distracted.
translation.fr:
‎On va voir qui va le plus loin
‎avant d'être distrait.

translation.en: Ready to do that? Let's do that, okay?
Cocaine, no cocaine, my attention will not be challenged.
You got a real drug problem, Eric.
What's that?
Well, these are the drugs I have to take to deal with you.
translation.fr:
‎Les pilules dont j'ai besoin
‎pour te supporter.

translation.en: All right, ready? No distractions, all right?
Just read. No distractions. No.
We just get right into it. We just get...
Just right into it. We're just gonna get right into it, all right?
translation.fr:
‎On se concentre.
‎On va juste se concentrer, d'accord ?

translation.en: -Fuck... ow. -Didn't know your knee was there.
translation.fr:
‎- Merde.
‎- Je n'avais pas vu ton genou.

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Yeah, I'm okay.
Hey, I love you. Okay?
What's the matter? What's wrong?
You say "I love you" too much.
translation.fr: ‎Tu me dis trop souvent que tu m'aimes.

translation.en: -Do I? -Yeah.
Okay. Well, I'm, like, so sorry to be affectionate to you.
translation.fr:
‎D'accord. Excuse-moi de vouloir
‎te montrer mon affection.

translation.en: -I guess that's-- -No, it's not affection, it's pressure.
translation.fr:
‎Tu ne montres pas ton affection,
‎tu me mets la pression.

translation.en: Because then if I don't say it back then it becomes a thing.
translation.fr: ‎Si je ne dis rien, ça crée un conflit.

translation.en: Well, why wouldn't you say it back?
I mean, if it's true you would say it, right?
translation.fr: ‎Si tu le penses, tu le dis, non ?

translation.en: 'Cause I, like, I love you.
Oh, my God, please stop saying that.
-Okay, well, I do. I love you-- -Okay, stop it!
-I love you. -Stop it.
-What is the fucking problem? -Gus, please shut up!
translation.fr:
‎- Où est le problème ?
‎- La ferme !

translation.en: I love you. God damn it! What is the matter?
translation.fr: ‎Je t'aime. Bordel. Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?

translation.en: -[groans] -What? Just fucking say it.
I fucked another guy! [sighs]
Well, you know, just so you know, like...
because we're broken up, that means, like, we're not talking anymore, you know?
translation.fr:
‎vu qu'on a rompu,
‎ça veut dire qu'on ne se parle plus.

translation.en: So you can, like, text, and you can call and, like, email me,
translation.fr:
‎Donc tu peux m'envoyer des SMS,
‎des e-mails ou m'appeler,

translation.en: but I'm not, like, gonna reply, okay?
-So, like, once you're out, you're out. -So we're never gonna talk again?
translation.fr:
‎- C'est fini pour de bon.
‎- On ne se parlera plus jamais ?

translation.en: No, because you fucked another guy, okay?
translation.fr:
‎Non, parce que tu as couché
‎avec un autre mec !

translation.en: I can't imagine that... that you're just gonna be around and you're not gonna be in my life.
translation.fr:
‎Je n'arrive pas à imaginer
‎que je ne vais plus jamais te voir.

translation.en: I mean, like...
obviously, we're still gonna be friends, okay?
-[screaming] No! -What the fuck?
This is what I'm fucking talking about!
Well, what am I?
Am I too nice? Am I too mean?
Yes, you're too fucking-- You're not nice!
You're... you're fucking fake nice, which is worse than being mean!
translation.fr:
‎Tu fais semblant d'être gentil,
‎c'est pire que d'être un connard !

translation.en: You know, it's over. I get that.
It's fucking over and it's done.
[sighs] I just want you to be true to yourself.
translation.fr: ‎Je veux simplement que tu sois toi-même !

translation.en: Okay, being true to myself?
-Yeah. -I want you to fucking die.
Okay? I want you to fucking get a disease and die,
translation.fr:
‎Je veux que tu chopes une saloperie
‎et que tu crèves,

translation.en: or fucking get in a car accident and die.
translation.fr:
‎ou que tu crèves
‎dans un accident de la route.

translation.en: That's what I want, I want you to fucking die.
translation.fr: ‎Voilà ce que je veux, que tu crèves.

translation.en: It's over.
-[car horn honking] -Oh, shit.
-What? What's wrong? -[sighs] We just gotta go quicker.
translation.fr:
‎- Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?
‎- On doit se dépêcher.

translation.en: -Why? What the fuck? -[moaning]
-My mom's here. -What the fuck?
translation.fr:
‎- Ma mère est là.
‎- Putain, quoi ?

translation.en: -Why is your mom here? -Oh, just go quicker.
translation.fr:
‎- Pourquoi ta mère est là ?
‎- Dépêche.

translation.en: -Come with me, come with me. -No, I can't. I can't just do that.
-You're like-- -[grunting]
What the fuck, dude? That's really lame.
Oh. Well, I just...
I got stuff to do today, you know? Gettin' it together.
translation.fr:
‎J'ai plein de trucs à faire.
‎Je suis occupé.

translation.en: You're really going right now?
What? Yeah. Yeah, she's taking me to buy pants and I totally forgot.
What the fuck?
-You can't but your own pants? -She offered.
translation.fr:
‎- Tu peux le faire tout seul.
‎- Elle me l'a proposé.

translation.en: It's not cute that you live with your parents, Eric.
translation.fr:
‎C'est ridicule
‎que tu vives avec tes parents.

translation.en: You tell people it's some sort of life hack, but it's just sad.
translation.fr:
‎Tu dis que c'est par économie,
‎mais c'est pathétique.

translation.en: It's sad to want new pants?
All right, I'm sorry, I'm a human being, all right?
Eventually, I'm gonna need pants.
[scoffs] Wait, you're going? You're actually going? Eric!
translation.fr:
‎Attends, tu t'en vas ?
‎Tu t'en vas vraiment ?

translation.en: I don't even know why it's something you get pissed off about.
-I need new pants. What's wrong with you? -Eric, fucking, you wait!
translation.fr:
‎- J'ai besoin d'un pantalon. Et alors ?
‎- Eric, attends !

translation.en: Don't get in that car. You were just fucking me--
[Mrs. Todd] Good morning, Mickey.
Hi, Mrs. Todd.
Hey, me and Eric are going to that new mall in Topanga.
translation.fr:
‎J'emmène Eric
‎au nouveau centre commercial de Topanga.

translation.en: Don't get in the fucking car, dude.
I'm so tired of you acting like a fucking child.
translation.fr:
‎J'en ai marre
‎que tu agisses comme un gamin.

translation.en: If you get in that car with your mom, then you're a fucking loser.
translation.fr:
‎Si tu pars avec ta mère,
‎ça veut dire que tu es un loser.

translation.en: Snore, snore, snore.
You're putting me to sleep, Ma. You're boring me to death right now, okay?
translation.fr:
‎Tu me donnes envie de dormir.
‎Tu es chiante à mourir.

translation.en: You think I'm a fucking child? You think I'm a fucking loser?
translation.fr:
‎C'est moi, le gamin ?
‎C'est moi, le loser ?

translation.en: Well, bullshit, all right? You're just as fucked up as me.
translation.fr:
‎N'importe quoi.
‎Tu es aussi paumée que moi.

translation.en: The difference is I have the balls to admit it.
translation.fr: ‎Mais moi, j'ai les couilles de l'admettre.

translation.en: Ma, let's go!
Eric, honey. Honey... why don't you invite your friend Mickey
translation.fr:
‎Eric, mon chéri,
‎tu ne veux pas inviter ton amie Mickey

translation.en: and we will go and get the slacks at the mall together?
translation.fr: ‎à venir au centre commercial avec nous ?

translation.en: He's not my friend. His cum is still inside of me.
translation.fr:
‎On n'est pas amis.
‎J'ai toujours son sperme entre les jambes.

translation.en: Eric, it's over!
[Eric] Who even talks to somebody's mother like that?
translation.fr: ‎Ne parle pas comme ça à ma mère !

translation.en: I'm open.
-Got you. -[girl chuckles]
[narrator on TV] Retaining a harem of over 100 females
translation.fr: ‎Conserver un harem de plus de 100 femelles

translation.en: will require him to fight many challengers... [thud]
[boy] Hey, um... a little help?
[narrator on TV] Elephant seal pups in such a hostile environment
translation.fr:
‎Dans cet environnement,
‎les jeunes éléphants de mer

translation.en: can sometimes get caught in the middle of these riots,
putting them in harm's way.
-Oh... Hey. -[boy] Hey, sorry about that, man.
[Gus] Oh, sorry?
Who cares, guys? It's fine.
Have fun, you know?
Here you go. Oop, sorry.
So you guys are up... [sighs] early, huh? You on spring break or...
translation.fr:
‎Vous êtes déjà débout.
‎Ce sont les vacances de printemps ou...

translation.en: -Oh, this is study abroad. -In Los Angeles, huh?
translation.fr:
‎- On est des étudiants étrangers.
‎- À Los Angeles ?

translation.en: The college, they put us up at the Springwood for a semester.
translation.fr:
‎On est logés à Springwood
‎pour un semestre.

translation.en: Yeah, since this shithole is basically, like, one step up from a dorm room.
translation.fr:
‎Vu que c'est le niveau
‎juste au-dessus d'une cité U pourrie.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna miss all the drug dealers
and child actors and the sad divorced guys.
translation.fr:
‎les enfants acteurs
‎et tous les divorcés dépressifs.

translation.en: Well, I'll let you get back to your Fris-ing.
translation.fr: ‎Je vous laisse retourner à votre frisbee.

translation.en: Well, hey, man, we're having a kickback tonight by the pool.
translation.fr:
‎On fait une petite soirée
‎autour de la piscine ce soir.

translation.en: You should drop by.
Yeah. Yeah, maybe. We'll see, we'll see.
[Mickey] So that's the bathroom, we have to share it.
-[woman] Oh, okay. -My mom gave me that stupid thing.
translation.fr: ‎C'est ma mère qui m'a donné ça.

translation.en: -It's nice. Uh-huh. -Um, that's the kitchen.
-Do you cook? -Uh, a little here and there.
translation.fr:
‎- Tu cuisines ?
‎- Un peu, des fois.

translation.en: -Baking... -Huh?
You never really hear about an Australian style of cuisine.
translation.fr:
‎On n'entend jamais parler
‎de la cuisine australienne.

translation.en: No, there isn't any.
-[cat meows] -Hmm. [gasps] No, bad, bad.
-Aw. Who's the kitty? -Ugh, sorry about that.
Oh, God. Are you allergic to cats?
No, no, no, I love cats. What's his name?
translation.fr: ‎Non, je les adore. Il s'appelle comment ?

translation.en: His name's Grandpa.
I named him that 'cause he's a reincarnation of my grandpa.
translation.fr:
‎Parce que mon grand-père
‎s'est réincarné en lui.

translation.en: -Cute. -So what do you think?
translation.fr:
‎- C'est chou.
‎- Alors, tu en penses quoi ?

translation.en: Of your, uh... Oh, here?
[stutters] Yeah. It's good, I like it.
So you wanna move in?
Um... oh, really?
Yeah, I mean, you don't seem crazy
and I don't feel like meeting with a ton of people. So?
translation.fr:
‎et je n'ai pas envie de voir
‎plein de monde. Alors ?

translation.en: Wow, okay. Great.
Great. I'll text that other girl and tell her to not to come over.
You snooze, you lose.
Cool. So were you, like, living with another roommate, or...
translation.fr: ‎Tu avais une autre coloc, du coup ?

translation.en: I mean, my boyfriend kind of lived here with me.
translation.fr: ‎Je vivais plus ou moins avec mon mec.

translation.en: It was sort of on and off. He'd come and go.
translation.fr: ‎Il était pas tout le temps là.

translation.en: He'd mainly live with his parents, but... then we broke up, so whatever. [scoffs]
translation.fr:
‎Il vivait surtout avec ses parents...
‎Mais on a rompu, donc bon.

translation.en: Oh, um, I'm so sorry.
Don't be. I'm so glad we broke up...
translation.fr:
‎Pas la peine.
‎Je suis contente qu'on ait rompu.

translation.en: I just don't really wanna live alone, you know?
translation.fr:
‎Mais je n'ai pas envie
‎de vivre toute seule.

translation.en: Well, that's perfect. We can hang out.
And we will.
I just wanna really clearly establish the roommate boundaries initially.
translation.fr:
‎Mais je voudrais établir
‎tout de suite des limites.

translation.en: That actually sounds like we've got a lot in common.
Well... [smacks lips]
get out of my space! [chuckles]
This is gonna be fun.
But, Mother, why is the wolf following me?
translation.fr:
‎Mais mère,
‎pourquoi est-ce que ce loup me suit ?

translation.en: Do not fear him. He is your protector.
translation.fr: ‎Tu n'as rien à craindre. Il te protège.

translation.en: Now that you're becoming a woman, your powers are growing.
translation.fr:
‎Tu deviens une femme,
‎et tes pouvoirs se développent.

translation.en: My powers? Am I becoming a witch?
We will know soon enough.
When your body aligns with the lunar cycle.
translation.fr: ‎Quand ton corps suivra le cycle lunaire.

translation.en: Now, command the wolf.
-[inhales sharply] -Sabien, submit.
He's not even looking at me.
Uh, cut!
All right, let's get the wolf to sit. How about that? What's the problem?
translation.fr:
‎Il faut que le loup s'asseye.
‎Pourquoi il ne le fait pas ?

translation.en: Arya, you have to make your hand a fist or the wolf won't sit.
translation.fr:
‎Arya, tu dois lever ton poing,
‎sinon le loup ne s'assiéra pas.

translation.en: I was.
No, actually, you were just holding your hand up.
translation.fr: ‎Non, tu as juste levé la main.

translation.en: Are you blind or something?
I was doing exactly what you said to. The dog's just stupid.
translation.fr:
‎J'ai fait ce que tu m'as dit.
‎Ce clébard est débile.

translation.en: God, just check the playback, I was doing it.
translation.fr: ‎Regarde la vidéo. C'est ce que j'ai fait.

translation.en: Arya, superstar, what up?
[groaning] I'm so tired!
-Evan. -Hey, what's up, man?
Hey, man. What's going on?
Not much. What do you need?
-Tutor time. -Seriously? You're doing this now?
translation.fr:
‎- C'est l'heure des cours.
‎- Sérieux ? Maintenant ?

translation.en: Dude, have you been paying attention? We lose the wolf in half an hour.
translation.fr:
‎Tu suis un peu ?
‎On n'a le loup que pour une demi-heure.

translation.en: No, I get it. I just... you know...
Arya needs her three hours of class...
translation.fr:
‎Arya doit suivre
‎trois heures de cours par jour.

translation.en: -every day. -Right.
I'm dealing with a child actor and a live animal here.
translation.fr:
‎Je dois bosser avec une gamine
‎et un animal.

translation.en: I-- I just need you to be a team player.
I know. But I feel like it's always
translation.fr: ‎Je sais. Mais il y a toujours des animaux

translation.en: animals that are coming in and push, you know...
translation.fr:
‎Je sais. Mais il y a toujours des animaux ‎qui viennent perturber...
‎Un jour, c'est des serpents, ensuite...

translation.en: One day it's snakes, the next day it's--
translation.fr:
‎qui viennent perturber...
‎Un jour, c'est des serpents, ensuite...

translation.en: Dude, have you ever worked on a supernatural period piece before?
translation.fr:
‎Tu as déjà bossé
‎sur une série paranormale ?

translation.en: Come on, man. Everyday there's a serpent or there's a mule.
translation.fr:
‎Allez, quoi. Tous les jours,
‎il y a un serpent ou une mule.

translation.en: I'm looking out for Arya here, okay?
translation.fr: ‎Je dis ça pour le bien d'Arya.

translation.en: I don't know what to tell you, man. They're witches, they deal with animals.
translation.fr:
‎Je sais pas quoi te dire.
‎Les sorcières utilisent des animaux.

translation.en: Evan, she needs three hours of class every day, okay?
translation.fr:
‎Evan, elle doit suivre
‎trois heures de cours.

translation.en: So we're doing this.
Seriously? That's the tone you're gonna take?
translation.fr: ‎C'est comme ça que tu me parles ?

translation.en: Yeah, come on, man. It's the law.
-It's called working-- -What's going on?
translation.fr:
‎- On appelle ça...
‎- Il se passe quoi ?

translation.en: -Is there an issue? -Susan, hey.
Uh, no issues.
Lovin' the scene, it's so good.
Guys, this wolf is almost out the door.
translation.fr: ‎On n'a plus le loup pour longtemps.

translation.en: -Can we handle this some other time? -[Evan] Yes.
Right, but it's just-- If Arya's not in class
translation.fr: ‎Oui, mais si Arya n'est pas en cours,

translation.en: and somebody reports this, we could lose our jobs and--
translation.fr:
‎et que ça se sait,
‎on risque tous nos jobs.

translation.en: [scoffs] Dude, you are the only one that cares about--
translation.fr: ‎Tu es le seul à te soucier...

translation.en: But we could. We could lose our jobs!
Hey, hey, hey. Why are we going crazy here?
translation.fr: ‎Hé, du calme. Pourquoi vous vous énervez ?

translation.en: Gus, listen.
I respect your passion and commitment here.
translation.fr: ‎Je respecte ta passion et ton zèle.

translation.en: -Thank you. Thank you. -[Susan] You know?
Yeah, and, you know, and if the wolf goes away before we get this shot, you know, that's... that's fine.
translation.fr:
‎Et si le loup s'en va avant que la scène
‎soit tournée, peu importe.

translation.en: You know, we'll... we'll work it out.
That means so much. I appreciate that. Thank you.
translation.fr: ‎Je suis très touché. Je te remercie.

translation.en: What would that mean, Evan?
I'm guessing we just have to come in on Saturday to finish?
Yeah, just come in over the weekend.
The crew will probably not like that much.
[Evan] Oh, they're gonna be pissed.
I mean, I guess you don't give a fuck about
people spending time with their kids. Oh, wait, you don't have kids.
translation.fr:
‎que les gens voient leurs enfants.
‎Tu n'en as pas.

translation.en: -[Evan] That's for sure. -Uh...
I feel like we're wasting time by arguing about it, so...
translation.fr: ‎On perd du temps à se disputer, donc...

translation.en: [inhales] Let's just do it.
-Really? Excellent. -[Gus] We'll do it. Mmm-hmm.
You're my soldier.
All right, we got another take, everybody. Second take.
Uh, why does everyone else get a CGI wolf? Why the fuck do we have a real wolf here?
translation.fr:
‎Pourquoi tous les autres utilisent
‎des effets spéciaux et nous, un loup ?

translation.en: Arya, hey. False alarm.
It's gonna be about 50 more minutes. And then, we'll take it to class.
translation.fr:
‎Tu en as encore pour 50 minutes.
‎Ensuite, on va travailler.

translation.en: I can't. I need a nap.
translation.fr: ‎Je peux pas. Il faut que je dorme.

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Nope. No naps today.
-I've been here since 6:00. -I know that.
translation.fr:
‎- Je suis là depuis 6 heures.
‎- Je sais.

translation.en: But how you gonna count all that money you got if, uh, you don't know math, right?
translation.fr:
‎Mais tu ne pourras pas compter
‎tout ton argent si tu es nulle en maths.

translation.en: Um, Jeff, the accountant?
Right, Jeff.
He's an Orthodox Jew, I think he knows what he's doing.
translation.fr:
‎Il est juif orthodoxe.
‎Je pense qu'il s'y connaît.

translation.en: [man on radio] Our next caller is Jason from Chicago.
translation.fr:
‎Le prochain auditeur s'appelle Jason,
‎il vient de Chicago.

translation.en: Jason, how we doin'? How's our day going?
translation.fr:
‎Jason, comment ça va ?
‎Vous passez une bonne journée ?

translation.en: [Jason] Well, my mom passed away.
Oh. My condolences.
I have to say, I'm not too torn up about it,
translation.fr:
‎- Je suis désolé.
‎- En fait, ‎je ne le vis pas trop mal,

translation.en: and actually, that's what's kind of got me upset.
The fact that I'm not upset.
translation.fr: ‎Le fait que je ne sois pas triste.

translation.en: We can't control how we feel.
And sometimes... [inhales]
these archetypical people in our lives, they hurt us.
translation.fr:
‎la présence de ces modèles à nos côtés
‎n'apporte rien de bon.

translation.en: And they don't fulfill the archetype.
What... what's an archetype?
An archetype is a...
Well, I don't really have the exact definition.
translation.fr: ‎Je ne connais pas la définition exacte.

translation.en: I do know what it means, obviously, because I just used it. Um...
translation.fr:
‎Je connais le mot,
‎puisque je l'ai utilisé. ‎CONCLUS

translation.en: Well, thank you so much for calling.
I am Dr. Greg Coulter
and you are listening to the Love and Living Channel
translation.fr: ‎et vous écoutez la Station du bien-être

translation.en: on Gravity Satellite Radio.
You listen, we hear.
Great. Great show, Greg.
[Dr. Greg] Oh, thanks so much, Rob.
-I really appreciate it. -So good.
-Good morning, Mickey. -Hey, you said you wanted to talk?
translation.fr:
‎- Bonjour, Mickey.
‎- Tu voulais me parler ?

translation.en: We need to fire Rob. Rob's gotta go. Does that make me evil?
translation.fr:
‎Je veux virer Rob.
‎Ça fait de moi un monstre ?

translation.en: No! Please. This is a business.
You know what?
Can you fire him for me... huh?
translation.fr: ‎Tu peux le virer à ma place ?

translation.en: -Or do program managers not do that? -[sighs]
What? I mean, okay, you know what? I'll do it.
If you do it, Rob will think I'm a coward.
translation.fr: ‎Sinon, Rob me prendra pour un lâche.

translation.en: Yeah, I think that's probably the right move.
No, wait, you know what? You do it.
I'm sorry, I'll stop being annoying.
So what's the problem? What did he do?
Look... Rob does a great job...
translation.fr:
‎Tu sais...
‎Rob fait très bien son boulot...

translation.en: but the guy creeps me out.
He's got this look in his eyes. You ever meet a person
translation.fr: ‎C'est dans son regard. Il y a des gens

translation.en: and they smile, and you feel like they're screaming at you?
What? Rob?
Rob's like the nicest guy in the whole world.
translation.fr: ‎Il n'y a pas plus gentil que Rob.

translation.en: He's nicer than both of us.
translation.fr: ‎Il est plus gentil que toi ou moi.

translation.en: Well, he's just got this bad energy, this aura around him.
translation.fr:
‎Je trouve qu'il a une espèce
‎d'aura négative.

translation.en: Has he ever done anything to you?
He asked me do I like him.
translation.fr: ‎Il m'a demandé si je l'aimais bien.

translation.en: That's weird, right? That's not a thing you ask anybody.
translation.fr:
‎C'est bizarre, non ?
‎Ça se fait pas de demander ça.

translation.en: -Let alone in a workplace. -[sighs]
translation.fr: ‎Surtout pas sur son lieu de travail.

translation.en: Look... I would fire him but I can't take that on right now.
translation.fr:
‎Je le virerais moi-même
‎si je pouvais le faire.

translation.en: This might be a difficult thing for you to understand
but I am very vulnerable in this job.
I have to be.
I make myself vulnerable to the world.
translation.fr: ‎Je me rends vulnérable au reste du monde.

translation.en: I can't be vulnerable around somebody like Rob.
translation.fr:
‎Je ne peux pas être vulnérable
‎avec quelqu'un comme Rob.

translation.en: So he's gotta go.
Fine, I'll do it just to end this conversation.
translation.fr:
‎Je vais le faire pour mettre un terme
‎à cette conversation.

translation.en: I'm a pussy, aren't I?
I'm sorry, I'm disgusting.
Okay, you know what? I'll do it.
translation.fr: ‎Tu sais quoi ? Je vais le faire.

translation.en: -[whispers] Thank you. -Oh, question.
What is a good band to work out to? Something new.
translation.fr:
‎Tu connais un groupe sympa à écouter
‎en faisant de la muscu ?

translation.en: [exhales] I don't know. The Monkees?
That's great. [chuckles]
Thanks, you're the best. You know what?
translation.fr: ‎Merci. Tu es géniale. Tu sais quoi ?

translation.en: You fire Rob.
[woman] So how was the move out of the Springwood?
Uh, you know, it's funny it didn't end up actually happening.
translation.fr:
‎C'est marrant, mais au final,
‎ça ne s'est pas fait.

translation.en: He finally realizes that the Springwood rules.
translation.fr:
‎Il a enfin compris que Springwood,
‎c'est génial.

translation.en: You love it there, right?
No. I mean... not exactly.
You can live anywhere in LA!
translation.fr: ‎Tu peux vivre n'importe où à LA !

translation.en: Okay, like, where?
I mean... [stutters] I've been looking, but it's just...
I'm having a hard time finding a place I like.
translation.fr:
‎j'ai du mal à trouver
‎un endroit qui me plaise.

translation.en: You can move near me. The Eastside.
I don't know. It's just a little too cool. And now...
translation.fr:
‎Je ne sais pas.
‎C'est trop branché. Et puis...

translation.en: I'd be like the Beverly Hills guy with, like, a white Corvette.
translation.fr:
‎Je pourrais être le mec de Beverly Hills
‎avec sa Corvette blanche.

translation.en: [clears throat] I mean, is that what we're doing?
[stammers] We're just playing what we'd wanna be?
translation.fr: ‎On ne joue pas à dire qui on rêve d'être ?

translation.en: I don't think it's, like, what I want to be. It's, like, who I am.
translation.fr:
‎C'est pas tellement qui je rêve d'être,
‎c'est qui je suis.

translation.en: Like, who am I?
I mean, like, where do guys like me live, you know?
translation.fr:
‎Les mecs comme moi,
‎où est-ce qu'ils vivent ?

translation.en: Where do the, like, repressed hostile nerds
whose girlfriend's accuse them of being "fake nice" live?
translation.fr:
‎que leur copine accuse
‎de faire semblant d'être gentils ?

translation.en: -Santa Monica? -No.
As long as I stay in the Springwood, you know...
maybe I get a text from Natalie saying, "Let's try it again."
translation.fr:
‎je pourrais recevoir un message de Natalie
‎disant : "On devrait retenter le coup".

translation.en: And I can just bop out of the Springwood back to another place
translation.fr:
‎Et je pourrais partir de Springwood
‎pour aller ailleurs,

translation.en: instead of like, bop Springwood, bop new place, bop Natalie.
translation.fr:
‎au lieu de faire Springwood,
‎un autre appart, Natalie.

translation.en: It's crazy, right?
Please don't tell me you think you and Natalie are gonna get back together.
translation.fr:
‎Ne me dis pas
‎que tu espères te remettre avec Natalie.

translation.en: -'Cause that's never gonna happen. -Yeah.
You're saying it... like, it's over?
She cheated on you. Why would you wanna be with her?
translation.fr:
‎Elle t'a trompé.
‎Pourquoi tu veux être avec elle ?

translation.en: Gus, she sucked, man.
[woman] Fuck Natalie. And fuck the Springwood.
I think you'll find someone better.
[stammers] You know, I know you'll find someone better
translation.fr: ‎Je suis sûre que tu trouveras mieux,

translation.en: and if you have trouble, I can set you up.
She wasn't right for you, dude.
I think I gotta go.
Gus. Wait. We gotta...
[sighs] We gotta pay.
Otis, put the dirt down now!
translation.fr:
‎Otis,
‎ne mets pas la terre dans ta bouche !

translation.en: I suppose it's better than Heather's kid. -She eats dog shit. -[snorts]
translation.fr:
‎La fille d'Heather est pire,
‎elle mange de la merde.

translation.en: [laughs] I'm serious.
Oh, my God, this day is dragging.
translation.fr:
‎Oh, mon Dieu,
‎cette journée n'en finit pas.

translation.en: You know what my favorite part of the day is?
translation.fr:
‎Tu sais quel moment de la journée
‎je préfère ?

translation.en: [sighs] Taking my Ambien.
-Really? -Yeah.
There's this moment right after it kicks in,
translation.fr: ‎Quand il commence juste à faire effet,

translation.en: and I'm still awake and everything is perfect.
translation.fr:
‎et que je ne dors pas encore,
‎c'est absolument parfait.

translation.en: Seriously, I look forward to 9:30 every day.
I don't like that shit.
I always wake up having made spaghetti.
translation.fr:
‎Je me réveille
‎et j'ai fait cuire des spaghettis.

translation.en: [chuckling] Spaghetti is the best. What's wrong with that?
translation.fr:
‎C'est super bon, les spaghettis.
‎Où est le problème ?

translation.en: You want some Ambien?
No, thanks. [sighs]
Are you sober?
Kinda.
I get it.
Fuck it! Give me some Ambien. Give me a whole handful.
translation.fr:
‎Et puis merde ! File-moi des somnifères.
‎File-m'en une poignée.

translation.en: [inhales sharply] All right.
I'm sure you have your own methods... but I turn off all electronic devices.
translation.fr:
‎Chacun sa méthode, mais moi,
‎j'éteins tous mes appareils électroniques.

translation.en: The last time I took an Ambien, I emailed my high school principal
translation.fr:
‎La dernière fois,
‎j'ai écrit au proviseur de mon lycée

translation.en: to tell him what a great job he had done.
[chuckles softly] That's why you're my favorite neighbor.
translation.fr:
‎C'est pour ça
‎que tu es ma voisine préférée.

translation.en: Otis, enough with the dirt.
translation.fr: ‎Otis, arrête de manger de la terre.

translation.en: You have reached your quota.
Down.
You know, I guess she used to be an extra on The Little Rascals.
For real?
-Yeah, no, she told me that. -[man] Jeez.
translation.fr:
‎- Elle m'en a parlé.
‎- Bon sang.

translation.en: -Hey, what's going on? -Hey. What's happening here?
translation.fr:
‎Qu'est-ce qu'il y a ?
‎Qu'est-ce qui se passe ?

translation.en: This old lady in E-2021 died.
translation.fr: ‎La vieille dame du E-2021 est décédée.

translation.en: I guess she fell in the shower
translation.fr:
‎Je crois qu'elle est tombée
‎dans sa douche

translation.en: and the water kept running on her body for, like, a week,
translation.fr:
‎et que l'eau a continué de couler
‎sur le corps pendant une semaine,

translation.en: so when they found her, the bathtub was full of mush.
translation.fr:
‎donc quand ils l'ont trouvée,
‎elle avait moisi dans sa baignoire.

translation.en: Jesus! [softly] What... What?
I told you not to give details.
translation.fr: ‎Je t'ai dit de pas donner de détails.

translation.en: Yeah, well, you're the one who gave me the details.
translation.fr: ‎C'est toi qui m'as raconté les détails.

translation.en: She lived here for 42 years, man.
How long have you guys lived here? Eighteen years.
translation.fr:
‎- Vous vivez ici depuis combien de temps ?
‎- Dix-huit ans.

translation.en: They're roommates but they're not gay.
Yeah, Chris, I don't care. That's fine.
Why, did you think we were gay?
We're best friends. This is my BFF. We're roomies.
translation.fr:
‎On est amis.
‎C'est mon meilleur ami. On est colocs.

translation.en: Yeah, no, he said... I didn't.
translation.fr:
‎Non, c'est lui qui a dit...
‎C'était pas moi.

translation.en: I don't even care. It's fine.
Nice to meet you.
-Yep. -Take it easy.
Later, dudes.
Hey, we're not gonna wind up like those two guys, are we?
translation.fr: ‎On ne va pas finir comme ces deux-là ?

translation.en: I hope so.
We should be so fucking lucky.
Thirty years of friendship?
We should be so fucking lucky, Gus.
Fuck it.
[sighs heavily] Shit.
translation.fr:
‎Pardonne-moi. On doit parler. ‎Merde. ‎Rdv à Bliss House.
‎3294 Wilton. Tu me manques.

translation.en: You know what I love about Uber?
translation.fr: ‎Vous savez ce que j'adore avec Uber ?

translation.en: You don't have to tip.
Fuck taxis, man. Uber's changing the world.
translation.fr:
‎Les taxis peuvent crever.
‎Uber va changer le monde.

translation.en: And you own this car, right?
It's, like, a nice car.
-Yes, ma'am. -[cell phone chimes]
[softly] Oh, shit! Oh, fuck! Shit!
[Rob on phone] Hello, this is Rob.
Hi, this is Mickey Dobbs, the program manager from work.
translation.fr:
‎Salut, c'est Mickey Dobbs,
‎la responsable de la programmation.

translation.en: Uh, anyway, you know that. [chuckles]
Um, I didn't...
Uh, I don't wanna do this over voicemail, but, um...
translation.fr:
‎Je ne voulais pas te laisser un message
‎pour te dire ça...

translation.en: Hello?
Hello? Is this...
is this one of those trick voicemail things?
Mickey, is that you?
God! Sorry! Your voice doesn't normally sound so message-y.
translation.fr:
‎Excuse-moi ! D'habitude,
‎tu ne parles pas comme une messagerie.

translation.en: [chuckles] No, it's me.
We're gonna put Frozen on in one second, honey, I promise.
translation.fr: ‎On va mettre ‎La Reine des neiges,‎ promis.

translation.en: Is everything okay?
Um... I don't know how to say this, uh...
translation.fr: ‎Je ne sais pas comment te dire ça...

translation.en: I'm just gonna... I'm just gonna come right out
and say it to you, 'cause I respect you, okay, Rob?
translation.fr:
‎et le dire parce que je te respecte,
‎d'accord ?

translation.en: You are fired from, you know, work.
[scoffs] What?
Greg told you to fire me?
But... it's nothing personal.
Sure, it's not personal.
You're just Dr. Greg's little henchman, that's all.
translation.fr:
‎Tu joues juste les hommes de main
‎du docteur Greg.

translation.en: Oh, come on, man. Aren't we all henchmen?
translation.fr: ‎Allez, on est tous des hommes de main.

translation.en: "Aren't we all henchmen?" What the fuck does that mean?
translation.fr:
‎"On est tous des hommes de main" ?
‎C'est quoi, ces conneries ?

translation.en: Are you high right now?
Are you on drugs?
-Drugs? -[car horns honking]
Oh, so you're firing me over the phone while you drive on drugs?
translation.fr:
‎Tu me vires par téléphone
‎en conduisant défoncée ?

translation.en: That's great. Why don't you show my daughter that?
Tell my six-year-old daughter that. Go ahead.
translation.fr: ‎Dis-le à ma fille de six ans. Vas-y.

translation.en: Hey, look, I drew a big star.
Oh, she drew a big star... [whispering] you fucking cock-whore!
translation.fr:
‎Elle a dessiné une étoile...
‎espèce de pute toxico !

translation.en: Whoa, dude, uncalled for! Shit!
-What the fuck are you wearing? -Aw.
I'm glad you made it.
translation.fr: ‎Je suis content que tu sois là.

translation.en: This is a really weird bar.
It's not a bar. You haven't heard of Bliss House?
translation.fr:
‎C'est pas un bar.
‎Tu ne connais pas Bliss House ?

translation.en: No. What is this, like, a...
like, a club for old people?
translation.fr: ‎Une boîte de nuit pour les vieux ?

translation.en: It's a church. Well, they say it's... like a church for all churches, you know.
translation.fr:
‎C'est une église, une sorte d'église
‎pour toutes les religions.

translation.en: It's more about oneness and togetherness, not so much a higher being.
translation.fr:
‎Il s'agit plus d'être ensemble,
‎de ne faire qu'un, que de prier.

translation.en: But I'm... I'm trying to say I'm sorry, all right?
translation.fr:
‎Mais là,
‎je voudrais te présenter mes excuses.

translation.en: This is... this is how I'm trying to say I'm sorry to you.
translation.fr:
‎C'est ma manière
‎de te présenter mes excuses.

translation.en: The midnight service is the best one.
-You're gonna love it. -Fuck, no.
Dude, no, no, I can't do that.
I'm wearing, like, a one-piece under jeans.
translation.fr: ‎Je porte un maillot une pièce et un jean.

translation.en: Hey! Our buddy from the balcony!
translation.fr:
‎Hé !
‎C'est notre pote qui était au balcon !

translation.en: Hey, what's up? You guys! All right. There you are.
translation.fr:
‎Salut, ça roule ?
‎Cool. Vous êtes tous là.

translation.en: You dropped by. You even brought your work backpack.
translation.fr:
‎Tu es venu.
‎Tu as même apporté ton sac de boulot.

translation.en: I'm Gus, by the way.
-I'm Nate. Good to meet you. -Hello. Hi.
-Hey, I'm Hailey. -Did you get a drink yet, man?
translation.fr:
‎- Salut, je m'appelle Hailey.
‎- Tu veux un verre ?

translation.en: Uh, you know what?
Yeah. Give me a beer.
-Give you a-- -[Gus] Yeah, give me a beer. Cool.
-Beer. [chuckles] -Thank you. Thanks.
-Cheers. -Yeah.
Good evening, blessed specimens of this lifetime.
How are you all feeling? I wanna hear you.
Tonight, we stand together
in a vibratory field of an advancing potential,
translation.fr:
‎dans le champ vibratoire
‎d'un potentiel en mouvement,

translation.en: the foundation of which is love.
Love doesn't just happen, we have to choose it.
translation.fr:
‎L'amour n'arrive pas par hasard,
‎on doit le choisir.

translation.en: We are in a phase of evolution where we have to agree with love.
translation.fr:
‎Dans cette phase de notre évolution,
‎nous devons accepter l'amour.

translation.en: We are in a phase of evolution where we have to embrace love.
translation.fr:
‎Dans cette phase de notre évolution,
‎nous devons adopter l'amour.

translation.en: We have to see love, feel love, touch love, heal love.
translation.fr:
‎Nous devons voir l'amour, toucher l'amour,
‎ressentir l'amour, guérir par l'amour.

translation.en: From the very core of our inner sanction.
translation.fr:
‎Depuis le cœur même
‎de notre for intérieur.

translation.en: Right? You guys know what I'm talking about.
-Come on, let me hear you. -[applause]
Holy fuck.
You guys are doing it right. Seriously.
translation.fr: ‎C'est vous qui avez tout bon. Sérieux.

translation.en: All of you guys, this is, like, what your twenties should be about.
translation.fr:
‎La vingtaine,
‎ça devrait se passer comme ça.

translation.en: Having fun, going wild.
Ever since I was a little kid, I've been acting like a grown-up.
translation.fr:
‎Depuis que je suis tout petit,
‎je me comporte comme un adulte.

translation.en: And now, it's like, I'm in my thirties,
and I'm, like...
"Oh, my God!"
I need to make up for lost time.
Hey, let's get fucking crazy tonight!
Will you shut the fuck up?
This is a family community.
Families live here. This isn't fucking Club Med!
translation.fr:
‎Il y a des familles qui vivent ici.
‎On n'est pas dans un club de vacances !

translation.en: Hey! Uh, why don't you just, uh,
let us enjoy this one special moment in our lives...
before we, you know, fucking slip in a shower and turn to mush?
translation.fr:
‎avant qu'on tombe dans la douche
‎et qu'on devienne tous moisis ?

translation.en: Go fuck yourself, man!
-I love you guys! -[cheering]
I love this place!
Guys, thank you so much.
So fun. Really--
-You're the man, Gus. -[Gus] You guys are...
-All right, we'll see you tomorrow. -See you tomorrow.
translation.fr:
‎- On se voit demain.
‎- À demain.

translation.en: Hey, what are you doing now?
Me? Um, sawing some logs. [chuckles]
translation.fr:
‎Moi ?
‎Je vais rejoindre les bras de Morphée.

translation.en: What... What does... What does that mean? I don't know what that means.
translation.fr:
‎- Ça veut dire quoi ?
‎- Je ne comprends pas.

translation.en: It means sleeping. It's like an old expression for sleeping.
We still have a couple of hours to kill. Do you wanna hang out at your place?
translation.fr:
‎On a encore deux, trois heures à tuer.
‎On peut aller chez toi ?

translation.en: Yeah. Well, okay. It's a little messy, if that's cool.
translation.fr:
‎D'accord. Ce n'est pas super rangé,
‎si ça ne vous dérange pas.

translation.en: [Hailey] Oh, God, it's fine.
Oh, my God! Your bedroom is literally identical to ours.
translation.fr: ‎Ta chambre est exactement comme la nôtre.

translation.en: -No way. Really? [chuckles] -Yeah. It's so lame, right?
translation.fr:
‎- C'est vrai ?
‎- Oui. C'est pourri, non ?

translation.en: Hey, look at these candles!
-They've never even been lit. -[Hailey laughs] So lame.
translation.fr:
‎- Elles ont jamais servi.
‎- Pourri, oui.

translation.en: It's crazy they have all the same stuff in every...
translation.fr: ‎Il y a la même chose dans tous...

translation.en: -Yeah. -I know.
-It's nuts. -It's, uh... They're like clones.
-They're clones of each other. -[sighs] -[girl] Clones. -[chuckles]
translation.fr:
‎- Ce sont tous des clones.
‎- Des clones.

translation.en: I'm gonna miss it though.
It sucks that we have to leave and fly back.
-[Gus] Uh... -We wanna move to LA after college.
translation.fr: ‎On veut s'installer à LA après la fac.

translation.en: -Ooh. -Oh, really?
-Yeah. [chuckles] -Oh, that's cool.
Yeah, 'cause we never did anything fun while we were here.
translation.fr:
‎On n'a rien fait de fun
‎pendant qu'on était là.

translation.en: We had all these, like, wild, crazy plans.
translation.fr: ‎On voulait faire plein de trucs dingues.

translation.en: -[laughs] -Oh, really? Like what?
You guys wanted to go to Six Flags or something, right?
No, like, um... [clicks tongue]
I don't know, uh... [sighs]
-Never mind. -[both chuckle]
-You guys are-- -We, uh...
We... we kinda...
-[chuckles] -We wanted to have a three-way.
translation.fr: ‎On voulait tenter un plan à trois.

translation.en: Have you ever had one?
-Mmm. Okay. -I... I don't think I have. No.
-No, haven't had a three-way. -[all chuckles]
translation.fr: ‎Non, je n'ai pas fait de plan à trois.

translation.en: Well, um, I know Reese hasn't...
-No? Right. [chuckles] -...and I haven't, and, uh...
translation.fr:
‎- Non. D'accord.
‎- Et moi non plus.

translation.en: -And I-- Yeah, I haven't. Yeah. no. -And... you haven't.
translation.fr:
‎- Et moi non plus. Non.
‎- Toi non plus.

translation.en: So, yeah.
Um, so, is... is it happening?
Now, is this it? This is the three-way? Yeah?
I think that was clear.
Children, please, step inside our vibratory field of energy and love
translation.fr:
‎Mes enfants, pénétrez le champ vibratoire
‎empli d'énergie et d'amour

that all those dipshits I went to high school with,
